document.docAuthor: Yazici, Gülten, Yildirim, Erol & Moulet, Pierre
document.masterDocTitle: Contribution to the knowledge of the Lygaeoidea (Hemiptera, Heteroptera) fauna of Turkey

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Contribution to the knowledge of the Lygaeoidea (Hemiptera, Heteroptera) fauna of Turkey

subSubSection.paragraph:
N o t e: Holomediterranean extending to Central Europe, Mid Asia and the Sudan .
N. cymoides
is polyphagous but in Iran it is a pest of
Sorghum (GHAHARI & MOULET 2012)
, known in meadows and fields ( LINNAVUORI 2007 ) on Onobrychis and Solanum tuberosum (GHAHARI & MOULET 2012).
